snippet: The police officer’s sentence in the death of an ultraconservative Muslim was a rare lengthy term for an officer convicted of abuse.
abstract: Egyptian police officer Osama el-Kounayassi is sentenced to 15 years in prison for fatally torturing ultraconservative Muslim, rare lengthy term for Egyptian policeman convicted of abuse.
lead_paragraph: The police officer’s sentence in the death of an ultraconservative Muslim was a rare lengthy term for an officer convicted of abuse.

headline.seo: Egypt: Officer Is Sentenced to 15 Years for Torturing Suspect to Death
headline.main: Egypt: Officer Is Sentenced to 15 Years for Torturing Suspect to Death
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Officer Is Sentenced to 15 Years For Torturing Suspect to Death
